propositions.text: 本文探讨了新世界（New World）这一概念，并深入分析了其在不同语境下的含义、发展历程以及其对全球格局产生的深远影响。
“新世界”一词最早在15世纪末至16世纪初，随着欧洲探险家对美洲大陆的发现和探索而出现。
它代表着欧洲人眼中一个与已知旧大陆（欧洲、亚洲、非洲）截然不同的、尚未被充分了解的地理区域。
克里斯托弗·哥伦布（Christopher Columbus）的航行被认为是“发现”新世界的标志性事件，尽管他对所到之处的地理认知存在偏差。
这一时期，欧洲探险家如费迪南·麦哲伦（Ferdinand Magellan）、瓦斯科·达·伽马（Vasco da Gama）等人，通过环球航行和海上探索，逐渐勾勒出“新世界”的轮廓。
“新世界”在地理、文化、生物等方面都与“旧世界”存在显著差异。
这不仅体现在动植物的独特性上，更体现在原住民文明的独立发展轨迹上。
欧洲列强在新大陆的殖民活动对当地文明和生态环境造成了巨大冲击。
殖民者的到来，带来了新的疾病、技术和政治体系，也引发了剧烈的社会变革和冲突。
新旧世界的物种、文化、技术、思想和疾病的交流，对全球产生了前所未有的影响，这被称为“哥伦布大交换”。
新世界传入旧世界：玉米、土豆、番茄、烟草等。
旧世界传入新世界：小麦、水稻、马匹、牛羊、葡萄、咖啡，以及天花、麻疹等疾病。
随着时间的推移，新大陆逐渐成为不同民族、文化交融的多元社会。
来自欧洲、非洲（作为被奴役者）以及亚洲的移民，共同塑造了新世界的社会结构。
在殖民统治和移民过程中，原住民文化、欧洲文化以及非洲文化之间发生了复杂的互动，既有融合，也有冲突。
“新世界”的概念也扩展到其他领域，例如对未知或新兴事物的比喻。
在现代语境下，“新世界”有时也用来指代互联网、人工智能等颠覆性技术所带来的社会变革。
这些新技术正在以前所未有的速度重塑我们的生活方式、社会结构乃至人类的未来。
人类对未知宇宙的探索，以及对未来社会形态的设想，也常常被赋予“新世界”的意味。

concepts.name: 新世界 (New World)
concepts.context: Core concept of the document, referring to the Americas discovered by Europeans, and extending to other contexts of novelty.

concepts.name: 欧洲
concepts.context: Originating continent of explorers and colonizers, contrasted with the 'New World'.

concepts.name: 美洲大陆
concepts.context: The geographical location initially referred to as the 'New World'.

concepts.name: 探索
concepts.context: The act of discovery and exploration that defined the early 'New World'.

concepts.name: 发现
concepts.context: The event of encountering the Americas from a European perspective.

concepts.name: 哥伦布
concepts.context: Key figure associated with the 'discovery' of the New World.

concepts.name: 旧世界
concepts.context: The known continents of Europe, Asia, and Africa, contrasted with the 'New World'.

concepts.name: 地理
concepts.context: An aspect of difference between the New and Old Worlds.

concepts.name: 文化
concepts.context: A significant aspect of difference and exchange between the New and Old Worlds.

concepts.name: 生物
concepts.context: An aspect of difference between the New and Old Worlds.

concepts.name: 原住民
concepts.context: Inhabitants of the New World prior to European arrival, whose civilizations developed independently.

concepts.name: 殖民
concepts.context: The historical process of European expansion and control in the New World.

concepts.name: 扩张
concepts.context: The process of European powers extending their influence in the New World.

concepts.name: 疾病
concepts.context: A significant element exchanged between the New and Old Worlds, with devastating effects.

concepts.name: 技术
concepts.context: An element exchanged between the New and Old Worlds.

concepts.name: 政治体系
concepts.context: Introduced by colonizers, leading to social change.

concepts.name: 社会变革
concepts.context: Consequence of colonization and exchange.

concepts.name: 冲突
concepts.context: Result of colonization and cultural interaction.

concepts.name: 哥伦布大交换
concepts.context: The widespread exchange of species, cultures, technologies, ideas, and diseases between the New and Old Worlds.

concepts.name: 物种
concepts.context: Exchanged during the Columbian Exchange.

concepts.name: 思想
concepts.context: Exchanged during the Columbian Exchange.

concepts.name: 移民
concepts.context: Groups contributing to the formation of a diverse New World society.

concepts.name: 多元社会
concepts.context: The outcome of cultural and ethnic mingling in the New World.

concepts.name: 融合
concepts.context: Interaction between cultures in the New World.

concepts.name: 未知
concepts.context: Characterizes the early perception of the 'New World' and modern areas of inquiry.

concepts.name: 新兴事物
concepts.context: Modern metaphorical extension of the 'New World' concept.

concepts.name: 互联网
concepts.context: A modern example of a disruptive technology that creates a 'new world'.

concepts.name: 人工智能
concepts.context: A modern example of a disruptive technology that creates a 'new world'.

concepts.name: 颠覆性技术
concepts.context: Technologies that reshape society, analogous to the 'New World'.

concepts.name: 社会结构
concepts.context: Reshaped by new technologies.

concepts.name: 人类未来
concepts.context: Influenced by new technologies.

concepts.name: 宇宙
concepts.context: The subject of human exploration, representing a 'new world'.

concepts.name: 未来社会形态
concepts.context: Envisioned and associated with the idea of a 'new world'.

main_topics: Definition and Early Concepts of the New World
Historical Process and Impact of the New World
Extension of the New World Concept in Modern Context
hierarchy.structure: The document is structured into an introduction, three main chapters, and a bibliography. Each chapter is further divided into sub-sections that elaborate on specific aspects of the 'New World' concept.
